task.title: Upload test results to a new test run in TestRail

taskbody.context: To upload test results from to a new test run in TestRail, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In , create a new test suite or a dynamic test suite.
Prepend the name of the test suite with the text S<ID>, where <ID> is the test suite ID of your choice.

image.alt: Create a new test suite to upload results to TestRail

step.cmd: Add the mapped test cases to the test suite.

image.alt: Add mapped test cases to test suites

step.stepresult:
A new Test Run is created in your TestRail project.
View Test Runs in TestRail

step.cmd: To view the Test Run details, click on the Test Run.

image.alt: View Test Run details in TestRail

step.cmd: In case you want to upload multiple test results to TestRail at the same time, you can add mapped test suites to a test suite collection.

image.alt: Add mapped test suites to a test suite collection

step.stepresult: will generate separate Test Runs in TestRail in correspondence with the executed Katalon test suites.
